sources.title: TheLawlessFontier
sources.description: John Tobin (John Wayne) is after the bandit Zanti (Earl Dwire) who killed his parents. He finds him just as Zanti is about to kill Dusty (George Hayes) and kidnap Ruby (Sheila Terry). Saving the two, he goes after Zanti. In true "B" western fashion, the good guys win out over the baddies and guess who gets the girl.
